sub_module.name: properties
sub_module.doc: Information about ingress CS TCAM, plus PRT TCAM and ePMF CS TCAM.

define.name: cs_buffer_nof_bits_max
define.doc: Length in bits of the Context Selection TCAM buffer for qualifiers or masks, the maximum of all ingress CS TCAMs.

define.name: nof_bits_entry_size_prefix
define.doc: Number of bits used in the prefix indicating half key or full key. Expected to be used for each half key at the lsb for tables that support half entries.

table.name: per_stage
table.doc: Per stage (CS DB) information, including whether the CS_TCAM supports half entries.

key.name: stage
key.doc: CS DB, which CS TCAM to provide information for.

value.name: valid
value.doc: If the stage has information in this table.

value.name: supports_half_entries
value.doc: If the CS TCAM can use half entries.

feature.name: disable_ecc_fix_en_before_read_write
feature.doc: Disables the ECC fixing mechanism before reading or writing to a CS TCAM (HWJERICHO2-2415).
